synopsis.text: To celebrate the new Strike Witches project, special event screenings will be held in theaters for Operation Victory Arrow. This operation unfolds in the gap between the conclusion of Operation Mars in the second season and the 2012 Strike Witches movie. The narrative is divided into three captivating short stories, each lasting 30 minutes, offering a glimpse into the daily lives of the members who have now returned to their homes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
